title: Purchase In-Flight Wi-Fi
description: A passenger on board a flight wants to purchase Wi-Fi access.

tasks.description: The passenger connects to the onboard Wi-Fi network and is directed to a payment portal.
The portal displays the available Wi-Fi packages and their prices (e.g., 1-hour pass, full-flight pass).
The passenger selects a package, enters their payment information, and their device is granted internet access.
tasks.expected_outcome: Passenger successfully purchases and connects to the Wi-Fi.
